detaileddescription.para: Draws the entity via self->mAnimation if set, or the first sprite which is idle.

detaileddescription.para: Searches for the cached entity whose name matches given str.

simplesect.para: null if it fails, else the found cached entity.

detaileddescription.para: Searches for the first entity with the name of given str.

simplesect.para: null if it fails, else the found entity.

detaileddescription.para: Searches for the first free entity.

simplesect.para: null if it fails, else the found free entity.
null if it fails, else a pointer to an entity_t.

simplesect.para: right now it just acts like memset(0) on entities in the global Entities scope. But it free's any other data that isn't globally set.

detaileddescription.para: Frees the non player entities, use for Destroy World.
Shutdown entity system, frees all the entities.
